ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
instructions: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients.
Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until the top and edges are golden brown.
title: Corn Bread Casserole
steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Pour into a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish.
Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until the top and edges are golden brown.
